ygData.subject: Re: Magical Weapon
ygData.msgSnippet: Any idea how much Demon Claws sell for?  How often does anyone sell them? Trent Carroll Programmer Houston Baptist University (281) 649-3410
ygData.messageBody:
Any idea how much Demon Claws sell for? How often does anyone sell them?

Trent Carroll
Programmer
Houston Baptist University
(281) 649-3410

> -----Original Message-----
> From: James Wofford [mailto:James.Wofford@...]
> Sent: Thursday, June 24, 1999 3:04 PM
> To: warriors_eq@onelist.com
> Subject: Re: [warriors_eq] Magical Weapon
>
>
> From: James Wofford <James.Wofford@...>
>
> As far as 1hs goes...
> I have a Demonclaw from the Avatar of Fear that is dmg 5 delay 19
> and use a
> rune sword in the secondary hand. It seems that I attack NON-stop.... It
> also seems that I rarely do damage above 14 with the claw and 17 with the
> runesword, but when you attack as fast as you do with these 2 weapons who
> cares. I also at one point had a babred leather whip to go along with the
> demonclaw, that is the best combo i can think of for 1hs... you
> NEVER stop
> attacking with those 2 due to the extrememyl low delays on both weaopns.
> The frequency of misses also seems to be higher, tho i believe that is
> completely due to the sheer quantity of attacks.
>
> Just some info on weapons for you.
>
> Dyvim Kincaid
> Stormriders of Cazic Thule.
>
>
> > -----Original Message-----
> > From: Zwanenburg, John [mailto:ZWANENJ@...]
> > Sent: Thursday, June 24, 1999 12:28 PM

> >
> >
> > Loth/Rayne
> >
> > > ----------

> > > Subject: Re: [warriors_eq] Magical Weapon

> > > For my warrior I purchased some magical weapons. I purchased
> a Tentacle
> > > whip (4, 25) for 25 plat and a Dragoon Dirk (6,23) for 45 plat. The
> > > tentacle whip isn't all that great, but I've got it on my
> > secondary hand,
> > > and occasionally it casts lifetap. I'd like something better
> that still
> > > has
> > > a fast delay and still does magic damage, but haven't found
> > anything yet.
> > > There is a barbed leather whip that does (6,25) i think, but it
> > sells for
> > > around 200 plat.
> > >
> > > Trent Carroll
> > > Programmer
